data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Saint-Pierre, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint-Pierre, Reunion
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Saint-Pierre, Reunion.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Saint-Pierre, Reunion.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 402 believers in Saint-Pierre to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Le Tampon
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Le Tampon, Saint-Pierre, Reunion.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Saint-Pierre.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Saint-Pierre, Reunion and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Saint-Pierre, Reunion, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

location.name: Saint-Pierre
location.cities_list: Saint-Pierre, Le Tampon, Saint-Louis, Saint-Joseph, Petite-Île
location.cities_list_w_pop: Saint-Pierre (76,655), Le Tampon (69,986), Saint-Louis (47,881), Saint-Joseph (33,694), Petite-Île (10,961)
